title: Chilliwack - Live at Sudbury, Ontario 2002-08-24
description:
CHILLIWACK
LIVE AT SUDBURY, ONTARIO 2002-08-24
Remastered Edition
RMW 810 / 811

This rare show was found on Usenet ca. 2005 or 2006. It is likely sourced from a minidisc recording, and is therefore lossy. I know of no lossless source. If one turns up, I will gladly discontinue this set, but I don't think it will happen.

This stereo audience recording is an entertaining listen. I hope there are other Chilliwack shows out there - this is the only one I've ever seen.

Track listing:

Disc 1:

 1.  Lonesome Mary			  8:33
 2.  Whatcha Gonna Do		          4:28
 3.  Getting Better			  5:15
 4.  California Girl			  4:44
 5.  Arms Of Mary			  3:39
 6.  Communication Breakdown	          4:34
 7.  Trial By Fire			  5:21
 8.  Seventeenth Summer	                 10:37
 9.  Dream Of You			  6:47
10.  There's Something I Like About That  2:56

Disc 2:

 1.  Crazy Talk			          7:36
 2.  Band introductions		          1:34
 3.  I Believe			          5:44
 4.  Baby Blue			          6:10
 5.  My Girl (Gone, Gone, Gone)	          8:07
 6.  Raino			          6:28
 7.  Fly At Night			  5:51

ffp file and artwork are included.

Enjoy!

Remasters Workshop

Re-seeded by Anajonda.
